vote.title: Authorize (1) the use of Cadillac Heights land located near the 2900 block of Cedar Crest Boulevard to include a future park; and (2) Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the professional services contract with Dunaway Associates, LLC dba Dunaway Associates for design services for the Cadillac Heights Park near the 2900 block of Cedar Crest Boulevard - Not to exceed $747,425.00, from $378,155.00 to $1,125,580.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the use of Cadillac Heights land located near the 2900 block of Cedar Crest Boulevard to include a future park; and (2) Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the professional services contract with Dunaway Associates, LLC dba Dunaway Associates for design services for the Cadillac Heights Park near the 2900 block of Cedar Crest Boulevard - Not to exceed $747,425.00, from $378,155.00 to $1,125,580.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
